HOW_IT_WORKS_BUYERS_STEP_1_DESC: Choose from a variety of home services and select the day and time you'd like a qualified Tasker to show up. Give us the details and we'll find you the help.
HOW_IT_WORKS_BUYERS_STEP_2_DESC: Select from a list of qualified and fully vetted Taskers for the job. Choose Taskers by their hourly rate and start chatting with them right in the app.
HOW_IT_WORKS_BUYERS_STEP_3_DESC: Just like that, your Tasker arrives and gets the job done. When your task is complete, payment will happen seamlessly and securely through the app.

LISTINGS_PROMO_DESC: We empower entrepreneurs with solutions in sharing economy. VQ Labs builds your online marketplace and turns your idea into reality.
